member.name: T:Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.SalesDiscounts.TotalSalesPriceDiscount.TotalSalesPriceDiscount
member.summary: Represents total price discount The total price discount lets you apply a discount to orders that exceed a certain total price. E.g. a customer buys for more than 1000 and gets a 5 percent discount

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.SalesDiscounts.TotalSalesPriceDiscount.TotalSalesPriceDiscount.ProcessOrder(Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.Orders.Order)
member.summary: Processes order by adding discount line to order lines
